resources.string: Type your password\n(From 4 to 6 into calculator) and hit “=” .

In case you forget your password simply enter a 
number ‘11223344’ into 
 calculator and press ‘=’ button,then retrieve your 
password by entering the answer 
 of your security question. or retrive by email.
Enter a 4-digit password and\npress the = button
You have enter the following number \n as your passcode
Calculator Lock : Gallery Vault needs \n permission to access photos, media \n and files on your device?
In case you forget your PASSWORD, we will send \nit to the email address below.
